body.p: WAYSIDE SCHOOL Mr. and Mrs, Art Schaar and sons visited at the Jake Bernards home Sunday evening. Art Schaar and Earl Nelson Jr. visited Bernard Carlson Saturday after- noon. Theodore 8chear was at Tigerton Saturday with John Hellstrom. Earl Nelson and children visited at the Art Aanonsen home Sunday after- noon. Mr. and Mrs. Tom Swenson and Laura Rasmusaon were Sunday after- noon visitors at the Homme Orphan Home. Mr. and Mrs. Rudolph Schoepke and family were callers at the Ed. Schoepke home Sunday afternoon and eve- ning, Mr. and Mrs. Art Grimstad and daughter Betty called st the Heldtborne Sunday evening. Margerle and Carol Kaufman were Sunday afternoon visitors at the Clarence Simonson home. Mr. and Mrs. Fred Dahlen of Rosholt visited at the Art Arnonsen home Sunday afternoon. The school board met at the A. R. Aggen home Friday evening. Mr. and Mrs. A. R. Aggen and daughter Arvtlls were Antigo callers Saturday. Mrs. John Liesch visited with Mrs. Bradendick at the Aggen home. Esther and Earl Anderson and Lawrence Buck visited at the Ed. Kaufman home Thursday evening. Mrs. Lawrence Buck and daughter Diana returned to the home of Eugene Buck. Mr, and Mrs. Ed, Kaufman and Patsy, Phyllis and Peter, and Art Carlson were at the Eugene Buck home Saturday.
